### DELTA
Calculates the absolute change of a gauge field in a time window.

```esql
TS k8s
| WHERE pod == "one"
| STATS tx = sum(delta(network.bytes_in)) BY cluster, time_bucket = bucket(@timestamp, 10minute)
```
